org.gruppe2

Class Resources

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gruppe2.Resources

  • public class Resources
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class with static methods for finding various resources. This differs from UIResources in that it doesn't import any JavaFX stuff, so that the master server can run on headless servers.
